scripts.run:test: npm run seed:database && mocha test/specs/database/*.test.js && npm run seed:database && webdriver-manager update && protractor config.js
scripts.db:test: npm run seed:database && nyc --reporter=text mocha test/specs/database/*.test.js && npm run posttest
scripts.unit:test: npm run seed:database && webdriver-manager update && nyc --reporter=text protractor config.js && npm run posttest
